EC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, age 30 days, mean length 16.5 mm, mean weight 0.067 g) 268 mg/L/96 hr; flow through, 25.8 °C, pH 7.55, dissolved oxygen 6.7 mg/L, hardness 45.8 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 42.9 mg/L CaCO3; Effect: Affected fish lost schooling behavior and swam near the tank surface. They were hyperactive, had increased respiration, and lost equilibrium prior to death. /99% purity/
